00012 CBitmap::CBitmap() {
00013  m_BitmapSurface = NULL;
00014  m_name = "";
00015 }

00017 ///
00018 // Creation Routines
00019 ///
00020 bool CBitmap::createSurface(Uint32 flags, SDL_Color *Palette)
00021 {
00022  if(m_BitmapSurface) SDL_FreeSurface(m_BitmapSurface);
00023  
00024  m_BitmapSurface = SDL_CreateRGBSurface(flags, m_width, m_height, 8, 0, 0, 0, 0);
00025  SDL_SetColors(m_BitmapSurface, Palette, 0, 255);
00026  SDL_SetColorKey(m_BitmapSurface, SDL_SRCCOLORKEY, COLORKEY);
00027  return (m_BitmapSurface != NULL);
00028 }
00029 
00030 bool CBitmap::optimizeSurface()
00031 {
00032  if(m_BitmapSurface)
00033  {
00034   SDL_Surface *temp_surface;
00035   temp_surface = SDL_DisplayFormat(m_BitmapSurface);
00036   SDL_FreeSurface(m_BitmapSurface);
00037   m_BitmapSurface = temp_surface;
00038   return true;
00039  }
00040  else
00041   return false;
00042 }
00043 
00044 bool CBitmap::loadHQBitmap( const std::string& filename )
00045 {
00046  if(!IsFileAvailable(filename))
00047   return false;
00048 
00049  if(m_BitmapSurface)
00050  {
00051   SDL_Surface *temp_surface = SDL_LoadBMP(GetFullFileName(filename).c_str());
00052   if(temp_surface)
00053   {
00054    SDL_Surface *displaysurface = SDL_ConvertSurface(temp_surface, m_BitmapSurface->format, m_BitmapSurface->flags);
00055    SDL_BlitSurface(displaysurface, NULL, m_BitmapSurface, NULL);
00056    SDL_FreeSurface(displaysurface);
00057    SDL_FreeSurface(temp_surface);
00058    return true;
00059   }
00060  }
00061  return false;
00062 }

00064 ///

00067 SDL_Surface *CBitmap::getSDLSurface()
00068 {
00069  return m_BitmapSurface;
00070 }

00072 void CBitmap::setDimensions(Uint16 w, Uint16 h)
00073 {
00074  m_width = w; m_height = h;
00075 }
00076 
00077 void CBitmap::setName(const std::string &name)
00078 {
00079  m_name = name;
00080 }

00082 ///
00083 // Drawing Routines
00084 ///
00085 void CBitmap::draw(SDL_Surface *dst, Uint16 x, Uint16 y)
00086 {
00087  SDL_Rect dst_rect;
00088  dst_rect.x = x; dst_rect.y = y;
00089  dst_rect.w = m_width;
00090  dst_rect.h = m_height;
00091  
00092  if( dst_rect.w>0 && dst_rect.h>0 )
00093   SDL_BlitSurface(m_BitmapSurface, NULL, dst, &dst_rect);
00094 }

00096 ///
00097 // Freeing Routines
00098 ///
00099 
00100 void CBitmap::destroySurface() {
00101  if(m_BitmapSurface) SDL_FreeSurface(m_BitmapSurface);
00102  m_BitmapSurface = NULL;
00103 }
